summary: This document is a certification of good standing for the nonprofit corporation Gratitude America, Ltd., filed with the Office of the Lieutenant Governor in the Virgin Islands. It confirms that the corporation was incorporated on April 25, 2012, and is currently in good standing.

persons.name: Denise Johannes
persons.context: Denise Johannes is identified as the Director of the Division of Corporations and Trademarks in the Virgin Islands, responsible for issuing the certification of good standing.

events.title: Incorporation of Gratitude America, Ltd.
events.description: Gratitude America, Ltd. filed Articles of Incorporation.

events.title: Certificate of Incorporation Issued
events.description: A Certificate of Incorporation was issued authorizing Gratitude America, Ltd. to conduct business.

keyFacts: The document certifies that Gratitude America, Ltd. is in good standing.
The corporation filed Articles of Incorporation on April 25, 2012.
A Certificate of Incorporation was issued on May 1, 2012.
